title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - November 2020
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided the monthly Android/Pixel update for November 2020. All supported Pixel devices running Android 11 will receive these software updates as part of the November 2020 update, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

Overview: 

Global:
Pixel 3 (XL): RP1A.201105.002
Pixel 3a (XL): RP1A.201105.002
Pixel 4 (XL): RP1A.201105.002
Pixel 4a: RP1A.201105.002
NA / US:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003.C1
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003.C1
NA / US / Verizon:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1B.201105.010
Pixel 5: RD1B.201105.010
NA / Canada:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003.C1
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003.C1
EU:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003.B1
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003.B1
APAC / AU:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003.A1
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003.A1
APAC / Taiwan:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003.C1
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003.C1
APAC / Japan:
Pixel 4a (5G): RD1A.201105.003
Pixel 5: RD1A.201105.003

Notable fixes:


The OTA update will roll out in phases depending on carrier and device. Users will receive a notification once it becomes available.

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
